etymologies: from modern Latin, denoting a houseleek

definitions: a widely distributed fleshy-leaved plant with small star-shaped yellow, pink, or white flowers, grown as an ornamental.

notes.text: Genus Sedum, family Crassulaceae: many species, including the stonecrops

shortDefinitions: widely distributed fleshy-leaved plant with small star-shaped yellow, pink, or white flowers
